challenges.title: Swap Two Numbers (By Reference)
challenges.description: Write a function swapNumbers(int &a, int &b) that swaps two integers using references. In main, read a and b, call the function, and print the swapped values.
challenges.outputDescription: Two integers after swapping: b and a, separated by space.

challenges.title: Increment by Function
challenges.description: Write a function increment(int &x) that increases x by 1. In main, read n, call increment(n), and print the result.
